main event: Two silvery, shiny discs were observed in a circular flight path over Diedesfeld, Germany on 27 July 1954.
interesting points: The objects were in formation for 15 seconds., The total observation time was 4 minutes., The discs hovered while jets were actively flying in the area., The sighting occurred amid cloud layers., The report noted insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: two silvery discs in the sky
